cause.description:
By donating you will help not well marketed, yet very artistic, Indie films get wider exposure.
The money will got to development of films already in production, as well as strategic distribution of the films in order to influence more producers to make their films here in Bay Area/San Francisco.
1. Exposing fresh artistic ideas!
2. Bringing filmmaking back to SF!
3. Helping young talented filmmakers!
cause.mission: Get more films produced in Bay Area!
cause.name: Filmmaking - Back to Bay
